com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.CacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataLoaderProvider, java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    Use methods based on OptimizedMapLayers instead. Since SDK 2.54.

    public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataLoaderProvider
    Handles storing and retrieving CachingDataLoaders by CacheKey.

    param: loaders associates CacheKeys to CachingDataLoaders param: policy defines the mapping logic between TileLoaders and CachingTileLoaders.

    For example, it might be used to define the caching logic for the predefined cache level groups: 

    
   CacheManager.withLruCache(maxByteArrayEntryCount = 0, maxInMemoryEntryCount = 500)
    or it might be used to define different cache sizes by layer and level. 
    
   CacheManager.withCachingPolicy(new CachingPolicy {
     override def createCachingTileLoader[T](cacheLevel: CacheLevel,
                                             inner: TileLoader[T]): CachingTileLoader[T] =
       (inner.layerName, cacheLevel) match {
         case (OptimizedMapLayers.RoutingGraph.layerName, InMemory) =>
           new LRUCachingTileLoader[T](inner, size = 500)
         case (OptimizedMapLayers.Geometry.layerName, InMemory) =>
           new LRUCachingTileLoader[T](inner, size = 100)
         case ("road", ByteArray) =>
           new LRUCachingTileLoader[T](inner, size = 100)
         case _ => new LRUCachingTileLoader[T](inner, size = 0)
       }
       override def createCachingDataLoader[Id, T](cacheLevel: CacheLevel,
                                                   inner: DataLoader[Id, T]): CachingDataLoader[Id, T] =
         new LRUCachingDataLoader(inner, size = 100)
     })
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • withLruCache

        public static CacheManager withLruCache(long maxByteArrayEntryCount,
                                        long maxInMemoryEntryCount)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a CacheManager with an InMemoryLruCachePolicy.

        Parameters:
        maxByteArrayEntryCount - Specifies the maximum number of entries a CachingTileLoader may contain for the byte array cache level
        maxInMemoryEntryCount - Specifies the maximum number of entries a CachingTileLoader may contain for the inmemory and on-the-fly cache level

      • withLruCache

        Deprecated. 
        Creates a CacheManager with an InMemoryLruCachePolicy.

        Parameters:
        maxByteArrayEntryCount - Specifies the maximum number of entries a CachingTileLoader may contain for the byte array cache level
        maxInMemoryEntryCount - Specifies the maximum number of entries a CachingTileLoader may contain for the inmemory cache level
        maxOnTheFlyEntryCount - Specifies the maximum number of entries a CachingTileLoader may contain for the on-the-fly cache level
